oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Effects of Anabolic Growth Implant and Restricted Feed Intake on Proliferation of Bovine Primary Skeletal Muscle Cells
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thomson, D. U.
Wileman, B. W.
Reinhardt, C. D.
Bradford, B. J.
Mamedova, L. K.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: steroid
skeletal muscle cells
Revalor XS
feed intake
muscle cell growth
feedlot cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this study was to evaluate the impact of a steroid implant, Revalor XS (200 mg trenbolone acetate, 40 mg estradiol) and/or restricted feed intake on nutrient metabolism and muscle cell growth of steers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2011; 180
